title: 502.80 COMMON LAW OF POWERS RETAINED, EXCEPT AS MODIFIED BY THIS CHAPTER.
text:
(a) The common law of powers remains in full force and effect and supplements the provisions of this chapter, unless explicitly modified or displaced by this chapter.
(b) If any provision of this chapter differs or is inconsistent with any provision in chapter 523 relating to powers of attorney, the provisions of chapter 523 shall prevail to the extent the provisions are different or inconsistent.
